leader_16: Such strong words from such a small cat! But remember, young one, respect is the cornerstone of our Clan.
leader_unabashed: Hey there, y_c. I've heard someone from o_cClan say they've seen you around the borders lately at the last gathering.
Like, what were you thinking? o_cClan cats could have...
Actually, that cat was kinda pretty. If you don't mind, go to the border some more so they can talk to me again?
broodingapp_toqueenapp: Do you know how to defend yourself?
If something were to try to harm these kits, how would you protect them?
Hm ... I suppose that's a ... decent strategy. But your form is sloppy, and your technique needs work.
Come and find me sometime, and I'll show you.
brooding_tomedapp: Have you heard anything from StarClan lately?
Hmph. Of course not. How typical.
Any longer and I'll start to believe our ancestors have given up on us.
brooding_leader: Hm? A kit? What are you doing?
Shouldn't you be in the nursery?
The leader's den is no place for one so young ...
brooding_medapp: [After a lot of pestering from the kits, you agree to show off some of the skills m_n taught you, and host a little training session.]
[t_c pads by the nursery, pausing to watch your demonstration.]
You call that a hunter's crouch? Tch...
Your stance is all wrong- your tail is too high and your paws are too close together.
And not to mention that mangy pelt... m_n has got some work to do, that's for sure.
[t_c flicks their tail as they leave the nursery, leaving you dumbfounded as r_k looks at you confusedly.]
brooding_deputy: y_c. We have something to discuss.
You've been avoiding patrols lately. Don't even try to deny it.
I know you don't like to take things seriously, but this is reality. We are warriors. Face it. Or don't.
But just know that your lack of initiative could cost your clanmates shelter, food, warmth and safety. Are you willing to risk it?
[t_c glowers at you, their expression unnervingly cold. StarClan, you forgot how scary they can be when they need to ...]
leader_4: I never thought one of my own would stoop so low.
leader_5: Your loyalty to our Clan is forever tarnished.
leader_6: The blood of your victim stains your paws, and it will haunt you.
leader_7: You have broken the code that binds us together as warriors.
leader_8: Your actions have brought shame upon our entire Clan.
leader_9: You will never be able to wash away the guilt that will follow you.
leader_10: In the eyes of StarClan, you are a murderer.
leader_1ax5w: Huh, I never took you for one to mince words.
leader_1axs5: Your anger is heard, as are your words. We shall speak again when emotions have cooled.
leader_1agx5: Your words carry weight, but they do not change who I am as a leader.
assertive_mentor3: Something I've noticed about you, y_c, is that you think too much.
That's not exactly a bad thing, plenty of apprentices are hesitant, but in the heat of battle, there's no time for thinking. You just have to see the target in front of you, and go for it!
Then again, I can't even remember how many times I've been chewed out by the deputy for acting too rashly ...
I guess it's all about balance. You can't doubt yourself too much, but you can't be blinded by confidence, either.
It's a tough thing to master, but I know you can do it!
assertive_mentor: Hey, y_c! Ready to start the day? I was thinking we could ditch the training grounds today and, instead, practice more real-world applied stuff.
Ah, don't look so worried. We don't have to do everything totally by the rules all the time! Sometimes, it's better to go off the beaten path.
I'll meet you by the camp entrance, m'kay?
assertive_mentor1: What's going on, y_c? ... Hey, don't give me that nasty look! I can see you, you know!
For an apprentice, you sure have a lot of attitude. I get you've got spirit, but if this is gonna work out, the two of us have to work together.
So drop it. And I'd better not catch you looking at me like that again!
assertive_mentor2: Alright, y_c! You're totally mastering that skill I taught you the other day ... you're improving so fast, pretty soon, you're gonna be outperforming me! Haha!
I have nothing to say, except for, I guess ... I'm proud of you.
You're turning into a fine member of c_nClan already.
assertive_jealous1: What did I do in a past life to wind up related to you, y_c?
assertive_parent4: What do you want? Do you need something?
... You just want to talk? Why?
Do we still even count as family anymore?
assertive_parent4_2: Ugh, StarClan, would you leave me alone?
Seriously, I don't know any other parent who bothers their grown kit this much!
assertivewarrior_mediatorapp1: [It's hard to believe your own kit is in charge of you now ...]
[The sight of them in the leader's den fills your heart with pride!]
assertive_parent4_3: Hehe, quit trying to fix my fur, y_c!
I'm not a kit anymore, I know how to do it myself!
assertivewarrior_mediatorapp1_2: Oh no you don't, y_c. Don't even try to convince me to make nice with r_c - it's not gonna happen. They totally stole the last fish from the freshkill pile! Don't they know that it's my favorite?
Okay, okay ... if you insist, I guess I can try talking to them again.
But don't try to get me to watch my tongue. If someone's acting like a stupid piece of fox-dung, I'm gonna call them a stupid piece of fox-dung!!!
assertivewarrior_mediatorapp2: Look, I know I can be reckless and headstrong and foolish and stubborn ...
But I didn't mean to steal r_c's catch! Seriously! And now they're acting all huffy about it ...
Any chance you could help me talk it out with them?
assertive_5: Hey, mouse-brain! Watch where you're going!
Wait, I recognize you. You're one of the new kits, right? Shouldn't you be in the nursery?
Hmph. Whatever. Just stay outta the real warriors' way, before someone squishes you.
assertive_4: Whoa! Watch where you're going there, little pal! One wrong move, and you might get stepped on!
Ah, quit that, you don't need to apologize. Just be a bit more careful from now on, is all.
Or else, when you get bigger, it'll really become a problem. Hehe!
assertive_tokit: Ah, y_c! There's the little bruiser! How're you doing? Growing up big and strong?
Y'know, at your age, I used to get into all sorts of trouble. Sneaking out of the nursery, following around the apprentices ... not to give you any ideas, or anything. Ahaha!
[t_c's laugh is so loud that it almost shakes your whole body.]
assertive_tonewborn: Whoa! Hey there, little guy! Shouldn't you be in the nursery?
Hehe. You've got an adventurous spirit. I like that about you.
But for now, you gotta stay where it's safe! C'mon. Let's go back to your parents.
assertive_tonewborn1: Aw ... little guy hasn't even gotten their eyes open yet!
They're gonna be a killer, though. I can already tell. See those little paws? This kit's got fight in 'em!
assertive_tonewborn3: Whoa ... this is them? They're so small!
Hard to believe I was that small once ...
assertive_1: Ugh. Can you believe how cruel some cats are, y_c? A bunch of apprentices were trying to convince these two kits to sneak into a badger den ... what a bunch of mouse-brains.
No matter what, don't let anyone try to pressure you into doing something you don't think is right. Go with your gut, and stick to your own values. That's what's really important.
assertive_elder: Did you see r_c earlier today, y_c? Oh, StarClan, it was the funniest thing ever!
They mistook a twig for a snake and flew, like, five fox-lengths into the air! Hahahaha!
assertive_elder_2: Yeah, I sent out a border patrol today. What about it?
You ... already sent one out earlier?
Well, why in StarClan's name would you not tell me that?!
[t_c stalks away muttering curses. You can't tell if you resent their disrespectful attitude, or respect it.]
assertive_app29: Tch. Did you see what a snake-heart r_c was acting like earlier? And over a piece of prey, no less!
Cat's so mouse-brained, probably can't even tell their own tail from a willow branch ...
... Whoa, what? Wait, you want me to apologize to them?
But they were in the wrong, not me! Why even entertain their behavior with an apology?
If they're mad, who cares! Let 'em stay mad! They can stay mad forever, for all I care!
Look, I know you're the mediator, and it's your job to resolve conflicts, or whatever, but ... you love me. Shouldn't you be on my side?
You'd really choose them over me?
assertive_app29_2: Let me guess. You've come to patch things up between me and r_c, 'cause of the fight we had earlier. That right?
I'll save you a few words - it's not gonna happen. Why's it always me that's gotta be in the wrong, huh? Why not force them to apologize?
Go find somebody else's problem to fix.
assertive_elder_3: Hey, furbag. I brought you something!
[t_c lays a colorful feather at your paws.
I know this is your favorite color, and you miss exploring the territory. So I knew I just had to bring it to you.
Yeah, yeah, don't get all soft on me, hehe. Wanna grab a meal together?
assertive_elder_4: Don't worry about being too rough, either ... I got nine whole lives to waste! Hehe!
assertive_elder_5: I gotta admit, it sure is nice to have a deputy as smart as you to deal with all the nitty gritty parts of clan management.
Just wait until you're leader! You'll see exactly what I mean.
assertive_elder_6: We're getting close to the gathering ... Better start thinking about who should go.
What do you think of r_c ...? Mm, maybe next moon.
Hmm. How about you keep brainstorming, and get back to me.
assertive_elder_7: What do you think of r_c's leadership skills? Do you think they have potential?
[You explain to t_c your observations and intuitions about the cat's behavior, citing specific examples and instances of times when you feel they've exhibited leadership.]
[t_c nods, eyes glinting with pride. Was ... Was that just a test all along?]
assertive_elder_8: What do you think of r_c's leadership skills? Do you think they have potential?

[In all honesty, you hadn't thought about it that much. You've been so busy with other things ... you mumble through a half-baked explanation about how the cat is probably suited for leadership, in certain situations.]
[t_c arches a brow. If that was meant to be a test, you clearly didn't do too well.]
assertive_elder_9: Hey, uh, I already sent out all the patrols for today. You can just go do ... I dunno. Whatever it is you do.
[You tense. Does t_c not trust you to do your job?]
assertive_elder_10: *Sigh* Y'know, y_c, sometimes I wonder if I'm really cut out for this ...
I'm supposed to be out on the battlefield fighting alongside my clanmates! Not ... organizing patrols and negotiating territory!
On the worst nights, I wonder why my leader even chose me to succeed them ... This responsibility was never something I signed up for!
If I could do it all over again, would I even have accepted my nine lives at all?
assertive_elder_11: Everyone in the whole clan is counting on me ... Do they know I have no idea what I'm doing?
Never in a million moons did I ever dream I'd actually be leader ...
I know I'm strong, but this position takes a whole new type of strength. I'm just not sure if I can ...
[You assure t_c that StarClan chose them for a reason and there's no better cat in the Clan for the job. They seem to relax a little, but their gaze is still tinged with uncertainty ...]
assertive_elder_12: Hehe, no need to look so scared. I don't bite!
Well, sure, I'm important, but never too important to spend time with my clan's great future warriors!
Now, tell me, how are you liking life in c_nClan? You growing up okay? Everybody treating you well?

If anything's ever bothering you, or there's something on your mind, never hesitate to speak up. This clan is full of cats who want to help you grow up to be the best version of yourself you can be, myself included. Okay?
Now, go play! And make sure you save a game for me later! Hehe!
assertive_elder_13: y_c, look at you! You are just growing up way too fast for your own good. Pretty soon, you'll be outpacing even me!
I better look out, or else c_nClan may have a new leader soon! Hehehe!
assertive_elder_14: Hey, y_c! Sure, I'll play a game! Who do you want to play as?
[One of the queens quickly intervenes, apologizing to t_c for your transgression, but they quickly brush it off.]
Ah, don't worry about it. I'm happy to give up my position to y_c for a time. They'll probably do a better job at it than I do, heh!
So, fearless leader, what are we going to do today?
[You spend a few minutes delightfully ordering t_c around until the deputy comes and steals them away.]
assertive_elder_15: y_c, today I'm assigning you to a solo patrol to the thunderpath.
... Yes, I know it's dangerous. That's the whole point. We are warriors, in case you've forgotten, not cowardly kittypets.
Now, hurry up, and get out there already!
assertive_elder_16: y_c, what's the problem? I'm very busy!
... You just want to 'chat' with me?
Hmph. If I were you, I'd smarten up and know better than to come to me with stuff like that. Especially now.
assertive_elder_17: Ahh ... plentiful prey, good health, greenleaf is when c_nClan is at its best!
It's also, coincidentally, when my job's easiest! Hehe!
assertive_elder_18: What's going on, y_c? I feel like you've been avoiding me lately.
You're ... worried I'm too busy for you?
Even though I'm leader, I'll always make time for you. You're important to me! The rest of the clan can wait.
You don't know if StarClan would approve of that?
Ah, who cares what those old, dead cats think? This is the land of the living!
And if I'm not allowed to spend time with you, then may they strike me down where I stand.
assertive_elder_19: We're all proud of you, kiddo. Don't think all your progress has gone unnoticed! I've been hearing great things!
It may be too soon to say, but there may be a new suffix coming your way ... If you have any requests, just let me know! *Wink*
assertive_elder_20: Some cats criticize me for being too reckless in my decision making ... fox-dung, I say!
Of course I value the lives of all my clanmates, but if there's one thing I value more, it's the principles and virtues that make this clan what it is.

Strength, courage, honor, skill ... These are all things that are too precious to forsake. And if something comes by to threaten those things, you bet I'm gonna fight back with everything I've got to protect them!
That's what being a warrior is all about. Not cowering like a kittypet and letting others take what's rightfully ours, just to save a few drops of blood from being spilled.
assertive_elder_21: Great! If we're all about to die, just do me a favor and let me know. You know where to find me! *wink*
assertive_queen: Heya, y_c! How are the little ones today?
If you ever need any help at all, just give me a shout. I know they can be a pawful! Heh.
assertive_queensapp2: Hey, y_c! How are the kits today?
Ahhhh! StarClan, they're so cute! Can I help groom them?

Or - how about this? Maybe, every once in a while, I can hold a little kit-training session! Help them get a head start on their apprenticeships! It'll be like having a den of little warriors, hehehe!
Though, I guess I can see how that wouldn't be the best for you ...
Oh, what the heck. Let the kits be kits for now! They'll start their training when they're ready.
Seeya, y_c! I'll definitely have to come and visit more often.
assertive_queensapp1: Hehe. Of course you'd never leave the nursery, y_c.
You don't have what it takes to be a real warrior. Not in a million moons!
But, uh, this is ... okay too, I guess! If you think becoming a full-time kitsitter is comparable to, y'know ... finding food and protecting the clan from danger.
Have fun hanging out with the queens, y_c. *Snrk*
assertivewarrior_mediatorapp: Man, you're insightful for an apprentice, y_c!
When I was your age, all I thought about was smashing stuff and chasing after my crushes. But now, here you are! Sorting out problems with cats who've been around ten times longer than you!
That must take a lot of discipline. The whole clan is proud of you!
assertivewarrior_mediatorapp_2: Oh, absolutely not. No way a little apprentice is going to tell me what's right and what's wrong.
Could you at least get your mentor over here, or something? Needing a so-called 'mediator' is already humiliating enough as it is.
Let alone when they're barely out of the nursery.
assertive_mediatorapp3: y_c, I think that peace is a noble pursuit, and all, but don't you think that there's some cases where conflict is necessary?
What about standing up for what's right? What about fighting for justice and fairness? You're still just an apprentice. You have a lot to learn about clan life.
And, from what I've learned, sometimes the true only way to settle a dispute is with teeth and claws.
No matter what your mentor might tell you.
assertivewarrior_med7: Y'know, sometimes I worry about you, y_c. If anything ever tries to hurt you, then how will you defend yourself?
Though, I guess if I were caught out in the cold, I wouldn't be able to patch myself up, either ...
Tell you what. How about, when you have a little down time, I can teach you some basic battle moves? And, likewise, you can teach me some stuff about healing!
That way, we can both make each other stronger.
assertive_med6: Hey, y_c! I got into a bit of trouble again. No big deal, just a scratch!
[It is not, in fact, just a scratch. In fact, t_c is bleeding all over the medicine den. They chat loudly as you hurry to help them.]
Man, I must be using up, like, half your herb stores, huh? But where's the fun in being careful? Besides, I know you could use some company in here.
Oh man, what type of herbs are those? They look cool. Are you talking to StarClan? Can you hear them right now?
[You finish helping r_c with their injury.]
Hey, thanks! I owe you a bunch! What? You want me to stay and rest? Sorry, y_c. That's not really my style. I gotta get back out there!
But, ah, maybe I'll try to go a little easier. Just for you. *Wink*
assertivewarrior_med5: Doesn't it drive you insane, being cooped up inside camp all day?
What about the thrill of adventure? The wind in your fur? The satisfaction of killing a hard-earned piece of prey?
Respect to you, y_c. I could never do what you do. Though, I suppose the clan needs all types of cats to function.
assertiveapp_medapp1: y_c, if you ever need a warrior escort while gathering herbs, you'll come to me, right?
I'll keep you safe from any danger that comes your way! Yah! Hiyah!
[t_c mimes battle moves against imaginary enemies.]
assertive_medapp: How's it going, mini-medicine cat? Herbal life treating you well?
Don't worry, I'm not going to run headfirst into trouble and injure myself today.
assertive_warrior_or_elder_2: Not always easy in the apprentice's den, huh? I remember those days. Sometimes cats can be so cliquey, especially the young ones ...
But, no matter what, you can never let fear hold you back from being who you are! Work hard, be friendly, and forget anyone who tries to get you down!
That's real bravery. Not just rushing into battle, but also standing up for what you believe in. And bravery is what makes a warrior who they are.
Heh, look at me, getting all wise ... Just my opinion, is all.
assertive_warrior: Heads up, y_c! Moss in the elders' den needs changing!
Guess being a warrior's not always fighting battles and scaring off kittypets, huh?
But there's still plenty of that, too, if you're lucky. Hehehe.
assertive_tokit_2: Hey, y_c! I brought you back something from my last patrol. Take a look!
[t_c drops a colorful feather at your paws.]
You wanna know how I found it? Oh, it's a crazy story. I was on a hunting patrol, when I found this huge bird, and ...
[t_c regales you with a daring story full of thrills, twists, and turns.]
... And then I got the feather! Quite the adventure, no?
Just wait until you're old enough. You'll be having plenty of adventures of your own before you know it!
assertive_misc: Yaknow, y_c, I never really found you all that convincing as a warrior.
Real warriors are strong! We're fearless! We never back down from a fight!
But in you, I sense ... uncertainty.
Maybe you should see the medicine cat about it.
assertive_rom: Hey, y_c! I just got a new scar today! Wanna come take a look?
Yeah, I ran into a little dog out at the edge of a territory. Wasn't too hard to chase off, but it gave me a little nick. Medicine cat says it's probably never going away.
[You brush your tail over t_c's scar, and they seem a little too thrilled by the gesture for it to just be friendly.]
assertive_rom1: StarClan, y_c, it's ... it's like you don't even know how beautiful you are.
... Augh. Look what you've done! Now I'm getting all sappy!
Just don't let it get to your head, furbag. I'm hot stuff, too.
[t_c winks at you, and you laugh together.]
assertive_rom2: Hey, y_c! I just finished visiting the kits in the nursery. StarClan, they're cute!
I wouldn't mind being a parent ... having a few mini-me's running around, terrorizing the clan.
How about you? Do you ever see yourself having kits someday? Not in, like, a weird way, of course! Just curious, hehe.
introspective_lead: Oh y_c, good morning, it's nice to see cats up bright and early.
Did d_n put you on a patrol?
Yeah, I know. They're really good at what they do. Very organised. StarClan has blessed me with them as my deputy.
Makes keeping the clan organised much easier, as I'm not constantly worried about organising everything. They have a talent for it.
introspective_lead_1: Yes, yes. I'm fine. I've just... been thinking.
Is StarClan and the Dark Forest all that's out there? Is there something beyond that? Maybe beyond our own perceptions.
Maybe all of our actions are being controlled by a being even stronger than starclan, using some sort of magic to view us to see what we're up to.
Maybe they'd get bored of us, or think I'm not good enough to be leader, and force you to kill me to take my place.
... Yes, t_c. You've been up too long. You need to go to bed.
I'll... see you later, y_c. Please don't tell anyone we spoke about this. They'll probably think I'm going senile.
introspective_lead_2: Yes. I'm perfectly okay. Just sitting and watching...
[They gesture over to a lake, where the moon echoes in the water.]
The moon is an interesting force. It's bright and lights the way, so we can see our paws when the individual lights cannot show us.
I wonder if it's the whole of StarClan, concentrated. StarClan's eyes. Or maybe it's our ancestors' love for us. The moon's always there for us, it's... everlasting.
... that's a nice thought. That we're not doing everything for nothing. Those before us think about us just as much as we think about them. It guides us like I try to do for our clan.
... Yes, of course. I'll speak to you tomorrow, y_c. May the moon follow you back to camp.
introspective_lead_3: The sun's especially bright this morning. It's difficult to think.
You know, as leader, I think I'm supposed to be like the sun, in many regards.
I'm meant to be bright, ever knowing, everlasting. I'm supposed to warm everycat's pelt and shine everyday to keep everything organised and together.
But, perhaps that's not my path. I could be like the moon instead. Still bright and guiding my clan, but allowing them the freedom to act, to think. To breathe.
Guiding, but not suffocating. You understand what I mean, y_c?
introspective_lead_4: [t_c is resting in the leader's den.]
I'm fine, mostly. Just taking a break from clan affairs. I'm not needed out there at this moment, therefore I can just... relax. You know?
I'll be out later, don't worry about me.
introspective_lead_5: It's lovely to run into you, y_c. How are you doing today?
I'm doing absolutely fine. Just got back from a patrol, it needed to be done.
I may be the leader of the clan, but I still live here, and therefore I still need to help provide for everyone.
Good conversation won't fill any bellies, after all.
assertive_comfort_2: Hey, y_c? Have you ever thought about, uh ...
What if something happens to you? Or something happens to me? Or something happens to the clan, and we're both demolished in a fiery pit of nothingness!
Phew ... sorry, I know I'm not usually so grim. But I guess I'm just really worried.
What if something goes wrong, and I'm not there to protect you?
I won't let that happen ... I just won't!
assertive_rom3: Hey, y_c, what are your thoughts on feathers as a nesting material?
Why? Psh, don't play coy! We're basically sharing a nest at this point, with how often you sneak into mine. Haha!
Tell you what ... how about we ditch the formalities altogether and just make one, giant, super-nest!
Better start gathering moss! I know it's your favorite.
assertive_rom4: What's that? One of the kits told you your ears are too big?
What a load of fox-dung! Those kits don't have functioning brains. Besides, I like your ears! I think it's cute, how big they are!
Er ... not cute in that way, mind you. Just, y'know ... ahem ...
[The blush on r_c's cheeks confirms that, yes, they did mean it in that way. And they're doing a terrible job of hiding it.]
assertive_dislike: Hey y_c. Why don't you jump off a cliff? It's a new thing every cat in the Clan is trying.
assertive_dislike1: Sorry, is someone talking to me right now?
assertive_dislike1_2: Can't you see I'm busy, mousebrain? Go bother someone else!
assertive_dislike1_4: Hey, y_c. You're looking smaller than usual. Maybe it's time to catch up on your training.
assertive_elder_22: *Sigh* Can't you see I have more important things to do, y_c?
Go back to catching mice, or whatever.
assertive_like: Hey, flea-brain! I've been eyeing this huge thrush on the freshkill pile all day - wanna share it?
What the - the thrush is totally missing! But I was saving it for us!
That's it! I will not rest until the cat who did this is hunted down ... AND BROUGHT TO JUSTICE!!!
[You and t_c dissolve into a fit of giggles.]
assertive_warrior_or_elder: Working hard, y_c? Or, is it more like hardly working? Hehe.
Y'know, it's good to contribute to the clan, but make sure you take some time to grow up, too. Working isn't everything. Now's the time for you to get out and explore!
*Sigh* I sorta miss those days myself ...
assertivewarrior_leader4: If you want my advice, y_c, you should never be afraid of conflict.

Conflict is a natural part of life! And if another clan or some mouse-brained rogues want to take what's rightfully ours, then it's our job to teach them a lesson. Remember that next time we run into trouble.
I don't know a single self-respecting warrior who'd follow a leader that runs rather than fights.
unabashed_leader2: You need to clean up your act, y_c. You've been severely underperforming- don't think I haven't noticed.
Everyone has to do their part, and that includes you, so don't make others pick up your slack.
unabashed_leader1: You know, it's kind of weird to think that I could probably get c_nClan to do just about anything.
Well, I guess not ANYTHING, but a whole lot of crazy stuff.
Heck, I could even just declare that no one's allowed to be mean to you!
[t_c starts laughing in an almost scary manner.]
...What do you mean that's corruption? I'd be nice about it! Probably.
...Nah, you're right. The Clan should probably be glad d_n is there to stop me.
bloodthirsty_pos: Hey, y_c. You want to see this scar I got? It's new.
It happened during a training session. I was practicing my battle moves, and I guess I got carried away ...
Everyone tells me I take things too far. In reality, I don't think I take things far enough.
I'm going to be the strongest warrior this clan has ever seen. Stronger than the strongest. I just have to figure out what I'm really capable of ...
bloodthirsty_pos1: What's that? You're exhausted from yesterday's training?
... Hmph. Fine. Have it your way.
bloodthirsty_rom: Hey. I saw you practicing your fighting techniques earlier.
They looked pretty good, but they could be better.
Your form is sloppy, unpracticed. It needs work. If you wanted, maybe I could ... show you sometime?
[If you didn't know any better, you'd think that t_c was blushing.]
bloodthirsty_love: Hey. I know this is your favorite prey, so I caught it for you. I hope you like it.
Don't mind the gore. I might've gotten a little carried away when bringing it down, but at least the good bits are mostly intact.
bloodthirsty_kit: Hmph. You think my battle moves are too violent? Come on, y_c.
Violence is what makes the clans what they are! Without it, we'd be no better than kittypets!
Don't tell me you're afraid of your own kit!
bloodthirsty_kit1: Would you please stop hovering over me? I'm not in the nursery anymore. I'm my own cat, and I can catch my prey however I like.
Even if it does involve beheading.
brooding_deputy19: I just got word back from m_n about your performance in training.
It seems you've been doing ... satisfactory.
Not bad. Keep up the good work and you'll earn your full name yet.
brooding_deputy13: [You overhear t_c and d_n very seriously discussing some diplomatic affairs with o_cClan.]
[Clearly, they're too busy with important matters to chat with you right now.]
brooding_deputy14: [The border patrol came back with news of twolegs on the territory, so t_c personally guards the camp entrance, casting paranoid glances.]
[It's clear they take their job as leader very seriously.]
brooding_deputy15: [You overheard a rumor that the leader of o_cClan is terrified of t_c, and it's not hard to see why.]
[Sitting up on the highrock with that intense glare, they just look so intimidating!]
brooding_deputy16: Hey, I saw you talking with r_k earlier.
The two of you seem awfully compatible ... what would you think about taking them on as an apprentice?
... I'll keep in mind. Thanks, y_c.
brooding_deputy17: Yes, I'm fine. Just a bit sore, is all. I think I've been tensing my muscles while I sleep at night ...
I'd thought I could handle the pressures of being deputy, shouldering the responsibilities of the Clan, but it seems the stress is manifesting in other ways ...
Ah, but come off it. I'm fine, I swear it. I'm a grown cat. I can handle my own issues.
Though, maybe I should consult r_m, if it gets any worse ...
brooding_leader0: Just to chat? Do you know who you're talking to?
I'm the leader of c_nClan. I have far more important things to concern myself with than 'chatting'.
brooding_leader1: [You tell t_c about an interesting dream you had recently that could be a potential omen from StarClan.]
Duly noted, y_c. Thank you for telling me. Please keep me updated if you hear anything more.
brooding_leader2: [You tell t_c about an interesting dream you had recently that could be a potential omen from StarClan.]
In case you haven't noticed, I'm the leader, y_c. I have more pressing things to worry about than your so-called 'interesting' dreams.
If a StarClan cat actually appears to you, that would be a cause for concern. Until then, you can keep your vague impressions to yourself.
brooding_leader3: [t_c is talking with a mediator from o_cClan just outside of camp.]
[The mediator tries to laugh and make jokes to ease the tension, but t_c won't even offer them a polite smile.]
[You hope your leader's hatred for small talk doesn't lead to serious conflict between the clans ...]
newborn_fromleader: Grow up to make c_nClan proud, y_c.
newborn_fromleader1: No, they're cute, y_p, don't get me wrong ...
I'm just worried about how fast our Clan is growing.
We may have to start sending out more hunting patrols to keep up.
newborn_fromleader2: [You bat at t_c's nose with your paw.]
I might have to be careful, or else y_c just might grow up and take my job! Hehe!
cool_5: [In the middle of a sparring session, t_c instinctively hides their face behind their paws.]
[In the end, t_c's face comes out untouched ... though, the maneuver did leave many of their vital organs unprotected.]
[Seems they don't exactly have their priorities in order.]
sweet_leader_1: Ah, r_c told me the news about your arrival. Greetings y_c, and welcome to c_nClan!
I hope I can be nothing short of the best leader I can for you... I can already tell that you'll be a wonderful warrior.
sweet_leader_2: Good evening, y_c! How's the nursery treating you?
Come on, let's go get something to eat, shall we? A little one like you needs to eat plenty to grow big and strong!
sweet_leader_3: [t_c pokes their head into the Nursery, smiling once they spot you]
It's okay to come on out now. Don't worry, the fox attack was just a false alarm, it seemed to have gone around the camp, luckily.
You can get some rest now, if you'd like. This was pretty stressful, and sometimes napping can relieve stress.
sweet_leader_4: Hm? Oh, it's just you, y_c. How are you doing this evening?
Am I sure you're gonna grow up to be tall? Well... Wanna know a secret?
When r_c was your age, they were even smaller! And now they're super big and strong, just like you will be one day.
sweet_leader_5: Oh, hello y_c! How has training been going?
I see, I see... Well, please let me know if there's anything I can do to make it easier for you!
sweet_leader_6: Ah, y_c! There you are, I have a huge favor to ask of you.
I'm taking some of the warriors down to the edge of the territory, there was a huge accident involving o_cClan warriors and I have to be there. Can you watch the Nursery while we're gone?
Thank you so much! You can take the rest of the day off once we get back for your hard work, then.
sweet_leader_7: Hmm, you wanna know what your warrior name is gonna be, y_c?
Well, I can't tell you, but I really hope you'll like it! What do you think it's gonna be, out of curiosity?
sweet_leader_8: Hey y_c, you look like you're having a hard time. What's up?
Mm.. I see.. Feeling insecure about your role in the clan? I understand.
Well, every cat in the clan has a very special role, from the smallest kit all the way up to the eldest elder. Your role matters too.
[t_c rests their tail on your shoulders] All you need to do is your best, you're perfect the way you are, as all cats in c_nClan are. Just because you don't really fight or hunt means nothing.
sweet_leader_9: How's Medicine Cat training been going for you? I was told you're learning about signs and dreams today.
Finding the role you're meant to do matters, and sometimes we find out what we're meant to do moons later than you'd expect.
Ah... You haven't been able to get those dreams... I understand. It's not an easy thing to do.
I have had one though, if you'd like to hear about it. It wasn't pleasant, but if it helps you in any way, I'm more than happy to talk about it.
In my dream, I found myself in this strange, stoney place. It was like the Twoleg Place not too far from here.
Though... it was different. The twolegs seemed to be absent, and their stony dens reached for the skies.
Some of their dens had toppled over, moss and vines seemed to mend the cracks.
I found a kit amongst the rubble, I took it with me and tried to find it's family, but they were no where to be found.
The kit told me to take it to the tallest building, and so I did. Looking down, the landscape almost looked like a forest.
That is when the ground fell away, and the surroundings melted into a starry sky. I didn't know how I was floating.
The kit's fur turned starry, and I realized...
This was during a time where my faith was shaken... They gently guided me back to the stars.
It was pretty scary at first, but after I got used to it, it was almost comforting being out there.
Finding your way as a Medicine Cat will be the same.
sweet_leader_10: [You've been trying to help mediate all day, but you are just an apprentice, you can't take this much for this long.]
[As another pair of cats approach you, you begin to tear up. You can't take more!]
Hey, you two! Can you please wait a few moments?
Yes r_c, I know. I'll come and help with the issue in just a moment. Please, have some patience.
[t_c waits for the other cats to wander away before wrapping their tail comfortingly around you.]
It's okay y_c. Just breathe with me for a few moments, okay?
[y_c does some breathing exercises with you, helping you calm down at least a little bit.]
You take the rest of today off. I'll cover for you, you get some rest.
sweet_leader_11: [t_c pokes their head into the den with a soft 'mrrp', looking around with a slight nostalgic glint in their eyes.]
Ah, y_c! I hope I'm not being too much of a bother. I just wanted to check and see how everyone in the clan was doing.
sweet_leader_12: [t_c called a clan meeting not too long ago to discuss a few things, though they were just about to wrap up.]
[They look over the whole clan with a warm smile, eyes filled with love for each and every clanmate.]
[You decide to approach t_c later to ask how they can be so warm to their clan, even to cats who don't like them.]
Mmh? Why wouldn't I? This clan is my family, I will love and care for them as such.
[You ask about the cats who don't like them, and their gaze softens a bit.]
Not every cat is going to like each other, not every family member will love each other, but you can't force that love.
That isn't going to stop me from caring about them, too.
sweet_leader_13: Oh, y_c! You look exhausted! What's wrong?
[You explain that the deputy put you on both dawn and dusk patrols, and how you hadn't had time to nap in the afternoon.]
I see... Go get some rest, I pardon you from your patrols today. I'll go in your place.
Don't worry about it! I need to bond more with the clan anyway, and what's better than a patrol?
Who else is going? ... Ah, r_w, I see! You go enjoy your rest now, I'll see you tomorrow morning.
sweet_leader_14: [t_c is staring at the stars from atop High Rock at night. As you sit next to them, they smile gently at you.]
Beautiful night isn't it? ... Ah, but I know that's not what you've come to tell me about.
[Their gaze shifts to a more serious one, though that gentleness can still be found in their voice.]
What news do you have for me?
sweet_leader_15: Hey, y_c? You're heading to o_cClan soon?
Things have been pretty tense between us. Can you please take r_w with you?
I'd come if I could, but there has been a large bird around and it's threatening the Nursery.
If I have time, I'll try and come over as well.
sweet_leader_16: [It had been a peaceful evening, you were wrapping up your duties for the day.]
[You turned your back for only one second, but one of the kits immediately darted away.]
[You gasp, and go to stop the kit, but t_c moves in the way of the entrance.]
Now now, r_k! Leaving the camp is super dangerous! You shouldn't be going out here.
Let's go back to y_c, alright? I can come tell you a story instead.
[They look up to you and give you a small nod, you let out a sigh of relief.]
sweet_leader_17: y_c!! It's so nice to see you this evening, how are you doing?
[t_c bounds up to you, pressing their forehead against you as a friendly greeting.]
I hope nothing's been too difficult for you. I know how tiring it can be being a deputy.
Just know that you're doing a great job, alright? I'm proud of you.
sweet_leader_18: Hey y_c! Can I get your advice?
I was thinking of assigning r_w as r_k's mentor when they become an apprentice. What do you think about that?
Mm... true, thanks for your input!
sweet_leader_19: [t_c jumps as you approach, sighing softly as they stare at the stars.]
y_c... I miss them. My old leader, I mean.
It felt like they knew what to do... but me... I feel like I'm lost.
I want to guide my clan to the best possible future... but I don't know...
Tell me... do you think I'm doing a good job?
sweet_leader_20: Ah, y_c! What are you doing up so early? You need your rest!
Well- yeah- I know I'm up this early too- did I sleep?
No, but I assure you, I had a good reason.
[You tell them that you won't sleep unless they do.]
Wait- no- ah fine. You're right. I need to start taking better care of myself.
[It's about time! That leader spends so much time caring for the clan that they don't usually care for themself!]
sweet_leader_21: [You're surprised to find y_c entering the Elder's Den, nowadays it's typically only apprentices or kits that visit.]
Hey y_c, I hope you don't mind! Admittedly, I've had quite a rough day.
I wanted to know, if it's not too much of a bother to you, if I could hear a story?
[It's not every day you get to tell the leader a story, but you'll gladly do so.]
sweet_leader_22: Surprise! I hope you like it.
I weaved flowers into the Elder's Den to spruce it up a little.
It's a little project I've been doing with the apprentices and kits of the clan. We're decorating!
I just felt, after all the service you all have provided, that you deserved it first and foremost.
